title: 1 BD - Rooftop, Fitness Center, Incredible Views and more!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
With high-end finishes and close proximity to local hot spots, these newly renovated luxury apartments in downtown Evanston have everything you're looking for.
The Presidential Apartments are steps from the CTA and Metra trains, shopping, dining and entertainment, Northwestern University and Lake Michigan.
Presidential Apartments raises the bar in this north side neighborhood.
Amazingly spacious apartments feature granite countertops, hardwood floors, air-conditioning, generous closet space, and views of beautiful Evanston.
- Rooftop Sundeck with Stainless Steel Grills and Lounge Space
- Indoor & Outdoor Lounge Space with Custom Firepit
- Short bike ride, bus ride, or drive to downtown
For more information and live availability, please visit our website: presidentialapartments.groupfox.com
